title: Zimbabwe's Mugabe to be buried in home district - government
text:
Zimbabwe's Mugabe to be buried in home district - government

Economy 44 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. Zimbabwe's Mugabe to be buried in home district - government HARARE, Sept 26 (Reuters) - Zimbabwe's longtime ruler Robert Mugabe will be buried in his home district of Zvimba, not at a national shrine in Harare as previously planned, the information ministry said on Thursday. Zimbabweans have been gripped by a public feud between government and Mugabe's family over where the country's long-ruling leader would be buried. Mugabe, who ruled Zimbabwe for 37 years until he was ousted by his own army in November 2017, died in a Singapore hospital on Sept. 6 aged 95.

Zimbabwe's Mugabe to be buried in home district - government
description: Zimbabwe's Mugabe to be buried in home district - government
